name: Dice Jumper (Spacepiano Games)
description:
Dice Jumper is a game hastily made in 3 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam

In this game, you play as a character trying to get home. It plays like a normal platformer, except you have to roll dice to determine your jump height. You can have up to 2 dice queued at any one time.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Jump

R - Roll a die

S - Switch dice

P - Restart the game
